website_summaries.verdict: This cute little shaver is a convenient size for travel but doesn't shave as smooth as a regular razor.
pros: Great for areas like armpits and bikini lines
It's safe for young girls or women who are learning to shave or who are disabled
cons: You can't retract the trimmer, and it can fall apart

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this item it not only barely shaved ANY hair, it also literally injured me. I have an actual small gouge of skin taken out of my armpit and it's VERY painful, red, and swollen, even a week and a half later! I can't use any deodorant because there's an open wound on my armpit and when the skin sticks because there's no deodorant, it rips whatever's healed back open. Save yourself the LITERAL pain and do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Cute, small, and cost effective
customer_reviews.text: I got this little shaver based off of a friend recommending it to me. Came quickly, and i got the pretty floral one. Comes with instructions, the unit itself that has a loop to hang it in the shower, and a cover for the metal parts (see image). I tested it on my arm and it works well enough dry. It says it can also work in water but to not submerge it. Needs 2 AAA batteries (not included) and is about as loud as an electric toothbrush. I’ll update later after I try it on my legs and in the shower to see if that changes how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: AujOnFire

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing so much! If you are in a rush or if you don’t want to shave your armpits/your hair on your armpits is too short to shave this thing is perfect, I wear tank tops to work every day so I always make sure that my under arms are shaved and this is saved me so much razor burn. You can also use it on your bikini line, legs, and your arms! It’s super easy to clean too and I have taken it on multiple airplanes! Extremely happy with this purchase, I actually just got my coworker the same one!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Mogavero

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shaver for my almost 11 year old daughter and it has been wonderful and easy for her to use. It's powerful and works well. To add to my recommendation, the design is super cute and the unit is compact enough to fit discretely into her toiletry bag when she goes on overnights or to sleep away camp. I'm not ready for her to use razors with sharp blades so this was a perfect compromise. If you're looking for a discrete shaver for yourself or a first time razor for your pre-teen, this one is it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelton Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on my legs and it doesn't shave close enough at all. Legs are still incredibly stubbly to the touch. Purchased for quick touch-ups while on vacation. I guess it's alright but not if anyone touches my legs.
customer_reviews.author: /T

customer_reviews.title: Nice close shave
customer_reviews.text: The Remington WSF4810 Shaver is a nice little shaver that gives a quick close shave. It's much better than other brands I've tried. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, old school ladies shaver, battery operated, cuts hair and no nick's!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute/colorful and easy to hold! My tweenage daughter loves it as her first shaver. She's autistic and weren't comfortable giving her a ladies razor, with her distractibility and sensory issues. We had her practice just gliding the shaver back and forth under her pits and even being off, it still shaved off her hair! Even better will save the battery ; )
customer_reviews.author: fairiebutterflymomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Works perfectly. I have large thighs and this thing worked fast and got all the hair. My hair was a lil bit long too and it did wonderful! Gives you a pretty close shave but not as smooth as a normal razor which is fine with me. FYI it did not cause the spots that appear on my thigh...I had those beforehand!
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Worked great a couple of times
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 yr old. She loved it. It was easy to use and a great price. Unfortunately it only worked a few times and no longer worked even after trying new batteries. Amazon did offer a replacement......Almost 2 months later the replacement has stopped working. Only used a few times. I contacted Remington and am currently awaiting another replacement. I will be sending back the defective product to Remington
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Sadness
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for about a month and it worked pretty well at first, it was never a clean shave but it did the job when you were running late. After about 5 uses it completely stopped working. I've tried everything to make it work and now I'm just gonna throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Low price, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Even though I’ve got a different design (not completely pink and white, but floral) than I ordered, I loved it any way. This product was delivered just on time, as expected. Right away I’ve put the two AAA batteries in it and used it immediately. Love it! A must have for me and my daughters, so I will be ordering more! I’ve had this Remington shaver for a long time before the last one stopped working (3 years I think). Low price, high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Gisela

customer_reviews.title: Hair removal magic
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little bit if hair removal magic! I legit take CHUNKS out of my legs when I shave them! Its painful and takes forever to heal because I'm also a picker! Worst combo ever! This little bit of magic fits right in my hand and gets rid of my baby fine leg hairs! I keep it in my purse incase I realize I missed a spot. I'll still use a razor maybe once a month but insted of shaving every other day, this us awesome and painless!
customer_reviews.author: pezzqt

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: I read an article about the return of this great lil product! I bought it immediately and loved it. I didn’t follow the directions, submerged it in water. It kept trucking for a bit, but repeated dumb moves left it dead... followed by reading the directions AFTERWARDS. bah! So I ordered another one. But it went ka-poot in an even shorter amount of time!? It is not an issue of battery life or position; nor operator error (this time!). I think it’s just a janky product. If it had successfully worked, I woulda loved it. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: LED

customer_reviews.title: Great product for out of the shower shaving
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 10 year old that was needing to shave but was too scared to use a regular razor. This is a great first shaver and gets pretty close. She shaved her armpits and legs with ease and is excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Item will not turn on.  Does not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Produce arrived in an over-sized box. Tried various sets of batteries and would not turn on. Couldn’t get it to work at all. Great size and fits in hand well however doesn’t work. Package was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana

customer_reviews.title: This little shaver works very well
customer_reviews.text: After burning through a couple of small shavers that used rechargeable lithium batteries that couldn't be changed and quickly gave out (one stopped holding a charge and another literally wouldn't turn off until it burned itself out!) I decided the heck with it, I would just get a shaver that used regular batteries. I live near the beach and have to shave my legs often. Of course a manual hand razor gives a smoother shave, but this little hand held shaver can be used in a pinch and for touch ups. I'm very happy with it. The price is right and it gives an acceptable shave with no pulling or nicking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a $30 shaver and lost it, so i took a chance on this one. Glad i did because it does the same thing, and is actually smaller so i can use it on my underarms. The other was way larger and wouldnt work on my pits. Havent used it wet only dry, but its nice you can do either if you wanted. It doesnt tell you how to clean it, it took me a min to figure out, but you can pull the metal razor part off and blow the inside out. So glad i took a chance on this inexpensive gem.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin/eczema etc. I have always used an "electric" type razor. I was intrigued by this "on the go" the compact size, the fact there is no cord (2 AAA batteries not included) was.a big plus. I read through the reviews and even though there are some negative, I decided for the price, it was worth the try. I love it. Easy to handle. Quick. Perfect. Highly recommend especially if you have skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: Janis R.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought product, put batteries in, used once.....it was ok, but not expensive so I kept it. 3 days later, tried to use, wouldn’t work. Drove to store, got new batteries, tried again, nothing. Waited a few days ....more new batteries...nothing....rip off
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 5 weeks. Used less than 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product! The on / off button doesn’t work properly & the battery’s don’t stay locked in place at all. The cover for the batteries doesn’t even lock in properly & it falls apart. In order for this to work, I need to awkwardly hold the cover for the batteries so it’s shut. If not, they fall out so easily.
customer_reviews.author: XTY

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing it's absolutely amazing. When you're like trying to shave the cuckoo you can apply pressure to this and it won't cut you I had I never have to worry about being cut with this razor. I can get the perfect shave.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: i like this product i bought it for my 12 yr old and it worked out perfectly no cuts close shave without mom standing there helping this is great for beginners i loved it so much i will be buying one for myself for on the go or traveling purposes will recommend for first timers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great razor other than dying quickly
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous model of this razor and looooved it, but it did have the issue of dying really quickly. Like, full kaput. I was hopeful that they would have fixed it, but no dice. I've had it a month and it's already dead, no matter how many different batteries I try. This is a great razor other than that. I would exchange for a new one if the return window wasn't closed, because I really do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Weasley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The shaver was recommended by a friend who has used hers for 2 years. As I get older I seem to be sprouting odd facial hairs and getting somewhat of a mustache - not so attractive on a woman. The razor easily rids my face of the unwanted hair and I only need to shave approximately once every 2 weeks. I highly recommend the item; it also works on underarms and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Grow

customer_reviews.title: Serves Its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so you get what you get. Good price, don't expect miracles. Its easy to use and clean. Its a great size to throw in your purse or gym bag for quick touch ups. If you don't have time to shave, its a good alternative to the real thing. You won't have baby smooth legs but no one will wonder if you've been trapped on an island.
customer_reviews.author: K. Burt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with a cleaning brush so 4 instead of 5. Electric shavers always come with a little cleaning brush. Otherwise not bad. Its a Remington. No nicking. With wear its losing its close cut ability, perhaps I need that brush or? Battery holds its charge well. Its sturdy and bigger to handle not a mini traveller. Its fullsize.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is very compact and easy to use. If you are looking for an electric shaver to remove hair this does the trick but it does not by any means give a close shave. There is still stubble left behind after using the shaver. It’s great though for quick touch up jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Love this easy product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third razor like this and I don’t know why I haven’t found it sooner. It is wonderful for touching up my legs etc. and it doesn’t need water but is waterproof and it doesn’t require any type of shaving cream etc. Great product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SummerLove 247

customer_reviews.title: Best little razor of its kind
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I have both used several brands of these small cordless razors but none have worked quite so well as this one. Close shave, smooth on the skin, doesn't snag the hair like some of the others do. We will probably never buy a different brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn Gwyrdd

customer_reviews.title: No Cleaning Brush but Works Great !
customer_reviews.text: Dont get this if yourw looking for a close shave. I didn't want it for a close shave, so it works good for me. I had an older model of this and it came with a little cleaner dude thing, but I was disappointed to see this one didnt. I don't use it in the shower so I cant speak on that part. Suprised to not hear the hair being cut while in use! ,just the sound of the motor.
customer_reviews.author: RLD

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this one for myself. But now I'm back buying another because one of my daughters swiped the first one. She says it shaves her legs better than her expensive electric shaver and in half the time. Now if I can keep this one hid from my other 2 daughters.
customer_reviews.author: WhatHappenedWas

customer_reviews.title: First Travel Shaver That Take 2 AAA Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Because of this travel shaver has trimmer edge that men's travel shavers doesn't have trimmer edge. I was little shock about this travel shaver use both of AAA batteries. I recommend 1000 Milliamp rechargeable AAA batteries for very long run time per charge instead throw away AAA batteries that won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Handy for light work.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little shaver for light or touchup jobs. It doesn't seem substantial enough to make quick work of heavier jobs. I got it specifically for my underarms, which always suffer from razor or standard shaver shaves, so it's well fit for purpose. It is small and light - perfect for travel. Installing the batteries and cleaning the heads are straightforward and simple. Am very pleased with it and would give it 5 stars except that the clear plastic blade cover does not fit tightly so I have a rubber band around it. Nuisance!
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Nice little shaver
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 11 year old daughter's first shaving experience. Used on underarms and was very gentle. Read instructions for inserting batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new electric razor because this one stopped working just months after I purchased it. I don't even have that much hair. When I used it no hair came up and I had to literally scrape my skin with the razor in order to get the hairs. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: TiwiAK

customer_reviews.title: Completely Useless
customer_reviews.text: This is the most useless piece of hair removal equipment I have ever used. I just doesn't remove hair! I bought it to use on my legs for vacation. You have to go over the same spot three or four times before it removes the hair. It seems very low powered. I put in several different sets of new batteries, but it always buzzed very slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Rowena

customer_reviews.title: Nice razor
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to use. I bought one for my 13yo and one for myself. She does her legs, I use it for unwanted facial hair. It’s a great solution when we are short on time.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two uses
customer_reviews.text: I used it twice and it stopped working. Didn’t even get to try the wet mode. Have no idea why it stopped working because I changed the new batteries twice. A total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Cami Rae Walter

customer_reviews.title: Good for a girl just starting out
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get terribly close, but it's good enough for last-minute shaving when you're in a hurry and don't have time to use a razor. I got it for my 12 year old daughter as her first razor and it works just fine for her. She doesn't really need a close shave, and it works well enough that she can't hurt herself with it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice low cost unit. It works nicely without pulling the hair. It does run on batteries so some may consider that a negative, but I wanted a battery operated unit. Its a good unit especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: pachygirl13

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Gift for preteen grand daughters. Easy to use, safe way for junior high girl to have first shaving experience.
customer_reviews.author: ph

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True!
customer_reviews.text: Remingtons little gadget has been around for years and it’s is fantastic! Very well constructed, Easy to hold, and a good close shave on my legs - that is enough for when you are on-the-go. While nothing beats the results of disposable razor, I still give this razor a 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Williams

customer_reviews.title: A good little tool.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. I however do not require a close shave. It wont be smooth to the touch. The final star was not reached due to that I have to remove the batteries during non use times or they will be dead when I return to use it. This isn't a major issue for me just not as convenient as I would like. Otherwise it works great and I don't have to worry about cutting myself. I have brain damage and razors can be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Rosharn Walker

customer_reviews.title: Hot Garbage...  Wait...  Easy to hold hot garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is hot garbage. Bought it for my daughter as a "first razor." It painfully pulled her out rather than shaving it off, and then stopped working completely after 2 uses. Total waste of money. Ordering a different brand today.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my light, thin hair
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me! Two important considerations: 1) I have multiple sclerosis, and shaving in the shower is sometimes a little precarious; 2) I have light blonde and not very much leg hair. So when it’s been a bit too long since I’ve felt up to shaving in the shower, I just grab this little beauty. It’s not as close as a razor, and if I had thicker or darker leg hair it might not be as good a solution. But for me, I wouldn’t change a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for teens
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 12 yr old daughter. Love the convenience and small yet comfortable size. Works great for her, still a little bit of stubble unlike a clean razor shave but it does the job as she gets used to shaving. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The regular woman's shaver I had finally died and was discontinued so I tried one of these until I could find a replacement to use. These are inexpensive and do a good enough job...easy to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: LHHughes

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: VERY WEAK! I put in brand new Duracell batteries... barely got anything out of it... sounded like it was ready to die ...😔 Would return for a refund if it were possible, and I hadn't thrown the package away already...🤬
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the best fine cutting electric razor but really what it is. I expected this and happy with the way it holds, has batteries no recharging by wall or USB so I’m happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how good this worked. I used it in my delicate areas and it did well. I really like it. The only negative is that I was a little confused about how to get the blade off and clean it. I figured it out, but it took me a second.
customer_reviews.author: Medusa

customer_reviews.title: Works on legs and armpits!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing works well for General body shaving no use it on my armpits and legs and I get a smooth finish. And it’s compact, easy to store and travel with.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting the pink one like bc there were no other options, but I got a designed one and it's a new version. Very pretty...I love it.
customer_reviews.author: VeronicaB.

customer_reviews.title: better than people say!
customer_reviews.text: i love this! it is extremely easy and simple to use! it's absolutely pain free, my 2yr old nephew say me doing it and asked me to do it to his arms, he laughed and said it tickled him! 🤣 obviously, it does not give as close as a shave as an actual razor, but it gets pretty darn close to it! small so you can take it on-the-go, and it gets the job done! only downside is that there's no compartment to catch the hair so it lands everywhere, and you have to wipe it off the shaver, but.. 10/10 recommend! already have friends asking for the link!
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Now that I’m older it’s hard to shave my legs in the shower. I can sit down and shave so much easier. Don’t have as much hair anymore so this does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: K McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: Well it works
customer_reviews.text: This is affordable and it works for what I needed it for. A quick easy shave. It can pull hair a bit. But no cuts or abrasions and it is good for the price and for an easy throw in your bag progusuct but I would recommend higher quality products for a more long term use. Again it definitely worked for what I needed and came same day so that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: April Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for fine leg hair
customer_reviews.text: Nice razor, but doesnt get all the hair, I have very fine hair, it may work better for thicker more coarse hairs
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Love this shaver
customer_reviews.text: No razor but a great shave. Close shave and very smooth. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working right away
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within 5 minutes, tried cleaning out, changing batteries and would work again briefly and stop.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Useless!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! It takes forever and does not get a good shave, not to mention a close shave. Would not buy again and definitely not recommend. It's a cheap thing and will go in the give away box! I would return but already threw away the box.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia B.

customer_reviews.title: This little shaver is a champ
customer_reviews.text: This little shaver is fabulous! Works great, low price. Even if it only lasts a few months it’s still cheaper than disposable razors. It works well...everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Llilith

customer_reviews.title: Good emergency/back up
customer_reviews.text: Not a close to skin shave, but good to have in the car when I notice I missed a spot that’s a bit long or didn’t shave and maybe want to be a bit more presentable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Trombley

customer_reviews.title: Does not get short hairs on legs.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Granddaughter and when asked how she liked it she said it was ok for very visible hair on legs but not for the new growth or if she missed a place with her hand held shaver this would shave as smooth. Over all for a much needed shave and if you don't care if it is not slick/smooth it is a handy little razor and the look of it is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Confused
customer_reviews.text: So I literally just got this put fresh new batteries in. I used it one time and the next day it didn't turn on. Once I changed the batteries which makes no sense because the batteries I used were fresh and brand new never used.. Once I replaced them it worked again. But after one use that's how quick the batteries ran out...? That makes no sense
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Amberlavage

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I paid $10 for this. It is just as the store versions (at walgreens/Walmart) it comes with a lid, which is a plus for me. I'd recommend!
customer_reviews.author: xON3OFAK1NDx

customer_reviews.title: Works okay
customer_reviews.text: The head gets clogged pretty easy and you have to pop off the top to get the hair bits out. Good for small areas of maintenance, not great for a full shave of legs etc.
customer_reviews.author: Spoco

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I would rather this better if it actually worked property. My legs are sensitive due to a medical procedure. This was purchased because of price and hoping it would get the job done. It is not smooth result is sporadic and would have to go areas repeatedly.
customer_reviews.author: Normajean Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these 20 years ago. I still have it and wanted to get a new one. Now I have two! I recommend that you buy one. You can use it in the shower too!
customer_reviews.author: karen foster

customer_reviews.title: Select another brand
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace batteries twice to shave legs. Power button had to be pressed multiple times before activation. Buyer beware, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Men pay attention
customer_reviews.text: First one was a dud but they sent a replacement and works perfectly. Can cut a straight line better than any men’s version out their on the market. My daughters are teasing me. It’s a girl shaver. Nope it’s a hair shaver and pink is the new yellow these days I say
customer_reviews.author: Shane bowen

customer_reviews.title: Small light weight
customer_reviews.text: Small light weight. Easy to use and cuts close without hurting. Fits perfectly in my purse or make up bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Hard to shave bikini line
customer_reviews.text: Standard razor. Noting fancy, but it is hard to get to the bikini line because of the plastic on the sides. I would recommend another option if that is an area of particular concern for you.
customer_reviews.author: kdb

customer_reviews.title: Good little razor
customer_reviews.text: I hate shaving my legs and am too poor for laser hair removal. I bought this for those times when a full on shave was not going to happen but I owed it to the public to mow the leg lawns. 10 minutes later, smoother legs ready for the public. Definitely worth the price for the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for a beginner! My 10 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once but be warned it is pretty LOUD!! I would compare it to that of a normal razor. Can't complain I guess when you think about the price of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOMANS RAZOR
customer_reviews.text: I JUST WANTED AN EASY WAY TO GET RID OF UNWANTED HAIR! THIS WORKS GREAT! FAST SHIPPING,
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Aldinger

customer_reviews.title: It’s “Okay”
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay. It doesn’t get down to the skin like a razor, but do any electric shavers really do that? It was helpful when I needed it after surgery, so it served its purpose. Definitely better than others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great little razor
customer_reviews.text: Would be a perfect 5 star review if it came w something to clean it. I'm amazed at how close it shaves!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Broken battery part
customer_reviews.text: Threw it away. The battery compartment broke when I tried to change the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: pmr

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is good for beginner shavers as its safe and easy to hold. My only issue with it was its operated by a battery if u use for a long time it will keep stopping! But it works with my daughter cause she shaves her legs fast and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this shaver
customer_reviews.text: liked it so much we ordered another for my grandson in different color easy to use easy to clean close shave
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this item. Due to some of the reviews. But went for it anyway. Well once I received it and put batteries in it. It would not power on. After trying out multiple sets of batteries it still would not work. I will be returning this item asap for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kira G.

customer_reviews.title: IT DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: I just got in mail and it doesn't work! I put new batteries in and it still won't come on! Such A disappointment I was really looking forward to this.
customer_reviews.author: Felishia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great little shaver
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar Remington shaver that I used for over 25 years, and it still worked until recently. So, I purchased this and thought it might be similar. It is! Great little shaver that's easy to use, easy to clean and works really well. Worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Gerron

customer_reviews.title: This is a LIFESAVER
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is a lifesaver! It is not the closest shave of your life, as it does leave behind some stubble, but that is absolutely perfect for me. It has cut my shaving routine down from close to an hour to less than ten minutes. 10/10 would buy again and recommend to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Leisha  Jones

customer_reviews.title: looks good...but disappointing:(
customer_reviews.text: battery needed to be changed. When I did, the back cover would not go back on....therefore, it wont turn on and cannot be used anymore. Too late to return it:(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's cheap and does the job no need to an expensive one, I love the shape it helps with holding it when you're shaving and love the color, does the same as any regular razor but with much lesser time and you can use on dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Closest shave without a razor!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, closest shave I've every gotten without actually using a razor. Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie I.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last at all...
customer_reviews.text: Easy product, no hustle to assemble but just stopped working after one single time use.😕
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Just got batteries for it it don't even work I'm disabled can't return it
customer_reviews.author: rebecca allenson

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Did not work right from the box, despite trying different batteries. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for traveling! Be careful as it is a very close shave and will have you with razor burn if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Tbabyt

customer_reviews.title: Razod
customer_reviews.text: I got this razor for my 11 year old who needed to start shaving. Not ready for her to use a real razor but this electric razor made it easy for her to shave for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a close shave
customer_reviews.text: It does leave a stumble feel on legs, but legs look shaved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and so easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on all areas. At this price, I ordered a second one to keep in my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Mize

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2nd use.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working on my third try. It's clean. I've changed several brands of new batteries until I realized; it's just broken. I have no idea why b/c I didn't use for long and cleaned it after each use. There's no option for a return so oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Longtime Amazon User TB

customer_reviews.title: Razor burn who
customer_reviews.text: This has basically replaced all razors for me and saved me from constant razor burn
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.  Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Tried several different sets of batteries. No go.
customer_reviews.author: jdub

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and helpful for body hair (including the bikini line). It’s a little hard to use on the bikini line because it’s a little hard to curve it but very affordable and saved me time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Bought this not really expecting much because of the price, but was really surprised at how convenient it was.
customer_reviews.author: debbie jasinski

product_meta.title: Remington WSF4810US Smooth & Silky On the Go Shaver, Wet/Dry Razor with Hypoallergenic Foil, Color/Design May Vary
product_meta.description: Color:PinkThe remington ready shave go wet/dry shaver is a compact battery operated shaver is easy to use wherever, whenever; with a full size foil and dual trimmers you'll enjoy quick and easy shaving with fewer missed hairs and smooth results even on the bikini line. the angled head helps give you a faster shave and the ergonomic design adds ease and comfort to your routine.
feature_bullets: Dual Trimmers Bikini Line and Quick Touchups
